description: Cafeteria Food Services for CBSA in Rigaud, Quebec, Canada.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title (English and French) 
47419-239098 - Cafeteria Food Service for CBSA in Rigaud
47419-239098 - Services Alimentaires de Cafétéria pour l'ASFC à Rigaud

### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: WS3620696571
* Amendment Number: 4
* Tender Closing Date: October 24, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 25, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: December 24, 2024

### Procurement Information

* Tender Status: Expired
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and several other agreements

### Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Contact: Corine Lavoie, corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### End User Entities

* Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* Address: 333 North River Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1L 8B9

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is inviting bids for the provision of cafeteria food services in Rigaud, Quebec, for the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA). The contract duration is expected to be two years. All bidders must submit their proposals electronically. The deadline for submissions is October 24, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive. The tender request and supporting documentation can be found on the Discovery website.

### Notice URL

The full tender notice can be found at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14231574?extsite=MTQyMzE1NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
